items.title: Shopping
content: Purchase equipment, weapons, armor, and supplies
Sell treasures and unwanted items (typically at half price)
Commission custom items (may require a deposit and waiting time)

items.title: Hiring Help
items.content: Find and hire hirelings, mercenaries, or specialists to assist with specific tasks or accompany you on adventures.

items.title: Information Services
items.content: Pay for information from local information brokers, sages, or scribes who specialize in gathering and selling knowledge.

items.title: Healing Services
items.content: Visit temples, herbalists, or healers who can provide healing services, cure diseases, or remove curses for a fee.

items.title: Transportation
items.content: Arrange for transportation by hiring carriages, boats, or mounts to travel between locations more quickly or comfortably.
